column6: Two more stand-alone stories of the wall-crawler by new and upcoming writers!  First, Robert Kirkman (CAPTAIN AMERICA) teams with his INVINCIBLE partner Cory Walker for a story of true love found amidst the carnage of a hold-up. Then, Allan Jacobsen and C.P. Smith (the creative team on the upcoming NEW INVADERS series) weave a tale connecting the web-spinner to the legends of Native America!
